text: What is the purpose of the USS file in the UI Toolkit?

options.text: It defines the structure of the UI
It defines the visual style and layout of the UI
It contains the script logic for the UI
It is used for localization of the UI

feedbackCorrect: The USS (Unity Style Sheets) file is used to define the visual style and layout of the UI in the UI Toolkit.
feedbackIncorrect: The USS (Unity Style Sheets) file is not used to define the structure of the UI, contain the script logic, or for localization. It is used to define the visual style and layout of the UI.
